A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: That the critic consensus on this is 93% is nothing short of baffling. This film is a betrayal of everything that Star Wars stands for as a mythos and\, beyond that\, all-around terrible on its own merits: sloppy writing\, sloppy editing\, sloppy jokes\, sloppy CGI. No heart and no conviction. If you are a life-long fan of Star Wars (and especially of Luke Skywalker)\, make better use of your time by simply re-watching the original trilogy. And finally\, a content warning: you have to look at shirtless Adam Driver and watch Luke drink fresh milk from the sagging udders of a naked alien ant-eater. I expect a class action lawsuit against Rian Johnson for emotional damages any day now.
